subject: Bobsledding
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: John Napier led a 1-2 finish for the United States in the two-man bobsled competition at a World Cup event Saturday at Mount Van Hoevenberg in Lake Placid, N.Y.
snippet: John Napier led a 1-2 finish for the United States in the two-man bobsled competition at a World Cup event Saturday at Mount Van Hoevenberg in Lake Placid, N.Y.
